verses.verse: And now<WH3548>, O ye priests, this commandment is for you<WH4687>.

If ye will not hear<WH8085>, and if ye will not lay<WH7760> it to heart<WH3820>, to give<WH5414> glory<WH3519> unto my name<WH8034>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, then will I send<WH7971> the curse<WH3994> upon you<WH779>, and I will curse your blessings<WH1293>; yea<WH779>, I have cursed them already<WH7760>, because ye do not lay it to heart<WH3820>.

Behold <WH1605>, I will rebuke your seed<WH2233>, and will spread<WH2219> dung<WH6569> upon your faces<WH6440>, even the dung<WH6569> of your feasts<WH2282>; and ye shall be taken away with it<WH5375>.
And ye shall know<WH3045> that I have sent<WH7971> this commandment<WH4687> unto you<WH1285>, that my covenant may be with Levi<WH3878>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

My covenant<WH1285> was with him of life<WH2416> and peace<WH7965>; and I gave<WH5414> them to him that he might fear<WH4172>; and he feared<WH3372> me<WH6440>, and stood in awe<WH2865> of my name<WH8034>.

The law<WH8451> of truth<WH571> was in his mouth<WH6310>, and unrighteousness<WH5766> was not found<WH4672> in his lips<WH8193>: he walked<WH1980> with me in peace<WH7965> and uprightness<WH4334>, and turned<WH7725> many<WH7227> away<WH7725> from iniquity<WH5771>.

For the priest<WH3548>'s lips<WH8193> should keep<WH8104> knowledge<WH1847>, and they should seek<WH1245> the law<WH8451> at his mouth<WH6310>; for he is the messenger<WH4397> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

But ye are turned<WH5493> aside out of the way<WH1870>; ye have caused many<WH7227> to stumble<WH3782> in the law<WH8451>; ye have corrupted<WH7843> the covenant<WH1285> of Levi<WH3878>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

Therefore have I also made<WH5414> you contemptible<WH959> and base<WH8217> before all the people<WH5971>, according<WH6310> as ye have not kept<WH8104> my ways<WH1870>, but have had respect<WH5375> of persons in the law<WH8451>.

Have we not all one<WH259> father<WH1>? hath not one<WH259> God<WH410> created<WH1254> us<WH898>? why do we deal treacherously every man<WH376> against his brother<WH251>, profaning<WH2490> the covenant<WH1285> of our fathers<WH1>?

Judah <WH3063> hath dealt treacherously<WH898>, and an abomination<WH8441> is committed<WH6213> in Israel<WH3478> and in Jerusalem<WH3389>; for Judah<WH3063> hath profaned<WH2490> the holiness<WH6944> of Jehovah<WH3068> which he loveth<WH157>, and hath married<WH1166> the daughter<WH1323> of a foreign<WH5236> god<WH410>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will cut off<WH3772>, to the man<WH376> that doeth<WH6213> this<WH5782>, him that waketh and him that answereth<WH6030>, out of the tents<WH168> of Jacob<WH3290>, and him that offereth<WH5066> an offering<WH4503> unto Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

And this again<WH8145> ye do<WH6213>: ye cover<WH3680> the altar<WH4196> of Jehovah<WH3068> with tears<WH1832>, with weeping<WH1065>, and with sighing<WH603>, insomuch that he regardeth<WH6437> not the offering<WH4503> any more<WH3947>, neither receiveth it with good will<WH7522> at your hand<WH3027>.

Yet ye say<WH559>, Wherefore<WH4100>? Because Jehovah<WH3068> hath been witness<WH5749> between thee and the wife<WH802> of thy youth<WH5271>, against whom thou hast dealt treacherously<WH898>, though she is thy companion<WH2278>, and the wife<WH802> of thy covenant<WH1285>.

And did he not make<WH6213> one<WH259>, although he had the residue<WH7605> of the Spirit<WH7307>? And wherefore one<WH259>? He sought<WH1245> a godly<WH430> seed<WH2233>. Therefore take heed<WH8104> to your spirit<WH7307>, and let none deal treacherously<WH898> against the wife<WH802> of his youth<WH5271>.

For I hate<WH8130> putting away<WH7971>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, and him that covereth<WH3680> his garment<WH3830> with violence<WH2555>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: therefore take heed<WH8104> to your spirit<WH7307>, that ye deal not treacherously<WH898>.

Ye have wearied<WH3021> Jehovah<WH3068> with your words<WH1697>. Yet ye say<WH559>, Wherein have we wearied<WH3021> him<WH559>? In that ye say, Every one that doeth<WH6213> evil<WH7451> is good<WH2896> in the sight<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and he delighteth<WH2654> in them<WH430>; or where is the God of justice<WH4941>?
